movie.title: Painted Faces
movie.description_intro: This is a story about the Peking Opera School that Jackie Chan, Samo Hung and Yuen Biao (the Lucky Stars) attended as young men. The story is about their teacher Master Yu and his school.
movie.description_full: This is a story about the Peking Opera School that Jackie Chan, Samo Hung and Yuen Biao (the Lucky Stars) attended as young men. The story is about their teacher Master Yu and his school.

movies.title: Pressed
movies.summary: Two joyriders Jesse and Sam discover something hidden in the back seat of the car that could change their lives forever. Brian, unknown to Jesse and Sam, is desperately trying to seek a "quick fix" business deal that will put him back on top financially after being let go from his executive position at one of the top investment firms. Brian decides to go "all in", investing the rest of his savings into a short-term drug deal. After Jesse and Sam intercept the illicit drug money, they soon learn that they've stolen from the wrong people. A twisted tale of greed, deceit, murder and wealth, PRESSED is an action-drama feature where three relationships collide. It changes lives, some of them for good.

movies.title: Song of the Sea
movies.summary: Saoirse is a child who is the last of the selkies, women in Irish and Scottish legends who transform from seals into people. She escapes from her grandmother's home to journey to the sea and free fairy creatures trapped in the modern world.
movies.description_full: Saoirse is a child who is the last of the selkies, women in Irish and Scottish legends who transform from seals into people. She escapes from her grandmother's home to journey to the sea and free fairy creatures trapped in the modern world.

movies.title: The Neighbor's Wife and Mine
movies.summary: A writer struggles to finish his story against many distractions, but the jazz party next door proves to be too much.
movies.description_full: A writer struggles to finish his story against many distractions, but the jazz party next door proves to be too much.
movies.synopsis: A writer struggles to finish his story against many distractions, but the jazz party next door proves to be too much.

movies.title: The Lonely Passion of Judith Hearne
movies.title_english: The Lonely Passion of Judith Hearne
movies.title_long: The Lonely Passion of Judith Hearne (1987)
movies.summary: A penniless middle-aged spinster scrapes by giving piano lessons in the Dublin of the 1950s. She makes a sad last bid for love with a fellow resident of her rundown boarding house, who imagines she has the money to bankroll the business he hopes to open.
movies.description_full: A penniless middle-aged spinster scrapes by giving piano lessons in the Dublin of the 1950s. She makes a sad last bid for love with a fellow resident of her rundown boarding house, who imagines she has the money to bankroll the business he hopes to open.
